meanings.definition: Resembling the sun in appearance or qualities.
meanings.sent1: The bright, sunlike flowers bloomed in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Her cheerful smile was as warm and sunlike as a summer day.
meanings.sent3: The sunlike hat made everyone laugh at the beach party.
meanings.sent4: His generosity shone through in a sunlike manner, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sunlike glow of the fireflies lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: Having characteristics similar to the sun.
meanings.sent1: The powerful, sunlike energy of the star amazed astronomers.
meanings.sent2: The sunlike heat of the desert made the journey challenging.
meanings.sent3: The sunlike strength of the superhero saved the city from disaster.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm was as bright and sunlike as a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The sunlike warmth of her personality made everyone feel welcome.
